# workoutStyle

**Instance Property**

The workout style for the intent.

## Declaration

```swift
var workoutStyle: Self.WorkoutStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

Your implementation’s `workoutStyle` property must be a type you define that adopts either the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEnum] or [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity] protocol. Declare this property using the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppIntent/Parameter] property wrapper.

```swift
// Define a parameter that specifies the type of workout that this
// intent starts.
@Parameter(title: "Start Workout Entity")
var workoutStyle: WorkoutEnum
```

For a complete description of implementing a [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/StartWorkoutIntent], see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/ActionButtonArticle]

## Defining supported workouts

- **WorkoutStyle**: The type to use for defining the intent’s workout style.
- **suggestedWorkouts**: A list of the supported workout styles.
- **invalidateSuggestedWorkouts()**: Tells the system when the list of suggested workouts changes.
